mean_cn: n. 异常的人；  adj. 越出常规的，反常的
mean_en: different from what is considered to be normal or morally correct
word_etyma: de 相反 + vi 道路 + ant 属于...的→在道路上逆行→ 不正常的
sentence: My teenage daughter is becoming a deviant, covering her body in piercings and tattoos!
sentence_trans: 我处在青春期的女儿正在变成一个离经叛道的人，她浑身都是穿孔和纹身！
